Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Petit Palace Bristol, you'll be centrally located in Valencia, steps from Palacio del Marques de Dos Aguas and National Museum of Ceramics. This hotel is within close proximity of Plaza de la Reina and Santa Catalina Church and Tower.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 43 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and a computer station.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Palacio del Marques de Dos Aguas - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
National Museum of Ceramics - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Plaza de la Reina - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi

University of Valencia - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
La Lonja - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Basilica of the Assumption of Our Lady of Valencia - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Central Market - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Plaza de la Virgen - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Valencia Town Hall - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Plaza del Ayuntamiento - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Almoina Archaeological Center - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Petit Palace Bristol is Valencia (VLC) - 8.7 km / 5.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
